Words to Kick Your Teeth Out

Hunter Hunter
    1. Hunter, hunter - I hunt for one like thee
    2. Hunter, hunter - why have you wounded me?
    3. Hunter, hunter - so strong and fair
    4. You surpass Eros in dread accuracy
    1. Hunter, hunter - where are your painless arrows?
    2. Hunter, hunter - I dream to hunt for gallows
    3. Hunter, hunter - of wild lands
    4. The hunt has hunted me through straits and narrows
    1. Hunter, hunter - can you find my path?
    2. Hunter, hunter - through woods and thorns
    3. Hunter, hunter - of the silver moon
    4. a stag implores you gut by its own horns
